item.title: Running Mistral AI on my machine with Ollama
item.description: Last week Mistral AI announced the release of their first Large Language Model (LLM), trained with 7 billion parameters, and better than Meta’s Llama 2 model with 13 billion parameters. For those keeping track, Mistral AI was founded in the summer of 2023 and raised $113m in their seed round. Ollama: Running LLMs locally In this blog post, we’re going to try out Mistral AI’s LLM on a local machine using a tool called Ollama.
